metadata.title: CVE-2020-6546 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in installer in Google Chrome prior to84.0.4147.125 allowed a local attacker to potentially elevate privilege viaa crafted filesystem.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
